name: Throttling
desc: See the object that wraps the throttling information that's returned for the create article and update article endpoints.

items.name: estimatedDelayInSeconds
items.desc: Estimate of the number of seconds until this request begins processing.

items.name: isThrottled
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether requests to this channel are currently being throttled. If true, this request is added to the queue to be processed later rather than immediately.

items.name: queueSize
items.desc: Number of requests currently queued for later processing.

items.name: quotaAvailable
items.desc: Number of additional article publish or update requests that can be submitted now, before the system begins throttling.
